description: World Weather Watch combines the power of a customizable world clock with city-level animated weather forecasts for every major region around the globe. World travelers, choose the cities you would like to see & the order you would like to see them in on the main window for an at-a-glance view of the date, time & current weather conditions across multiple cities.    World Weather Watch also provides three day weather forecasts for every city on your list.  Forecast pages are beautifully rendered in full-motion cinematic graphics that show the current weather conditions.  You will see rain streak down your phone’s display, snow flurries whisk by, frost creep over the edges & lightning bolts shoot across the sky. At night you’ll see an accurate depiction of the moon in the correct moon phase.   Finally, World Weather Watch provides a real-time rendered image of the Earth from geosynchronous weather satellites overlaid with real time cloud cover information.  This map also displays where the sun is shining & where it is not so you can track the sunrise as it travels the globe. This view is spectacular for its sheer beauty and as a fascinating way to track global weather patterns.
